skill.name: smc-chart-analysis
skill.description: Smart Money Concepts (SMC) and ICT-style chart analysis skill. Analyzes any market with one command - fetches real data, runs multi-timeframe analysis, identifies trade setups with entry/stop/targets. Use when user asks to "analyze [SYMBOL]", wants SMC/ICT analysis, asks about liquidity sweeps, order blocks, fair value gaps, or market structure, or wants trade setup recommendations.
skill.summary: Smart Money Concepts (SMC) and ICT-style chart analysis skill. Analyzes any market with one command ...
skill.author: AaronAbuUsama

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation-only skill with no executable code, no file system access, no network calls, and no external commands. Contains only markdown reference files for AI guidance on SMC trading methodology.

content.user_title: Analyze markets with Smart Money Concepts
content.value_statement: Traders need systematic methods to interpret market structure and identify institutional trading patterns. This skill provides AI-powered analysis using SMC/ICT methodology to identify bias, entry zones, stop levels, and targets.
actual_capabilities: Determines market bias from higher timeframe structure
Identifies liquidity levels and recent sweeps
Locates order blocks and fair value gaps
Constructs trade setups with entry, stop, and targets
Provides risk assessment with R:R ratios
limitations: Does not execute trades or connect to exchanges
Requires external data source for mechanical analysis
Does not provide financial advice or guarantees
Analysis quality depends on input data accuracy

use_cases.title: Learn SMC methodology
use_cases.description: Understand market structure, liquidity concepts, and order flow patterns through guided analysis examples.

use_cases.title: Daily market analysis
use_cases.description: Get structured breakdowns of bias, key levels, and trade setups for specific symbols and timeframes.

use_cases.title: Strategy framework
use_cases.description: Use SMC detection patterns and narrative templates to build systematic trading approaches.

prompt_templates.title: Basic analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze [SYMBOL] on the [TIMEFRAME] timeframe using SMC methodology. Identify bias, key liquidity levels, order blocks, and any trade setups.

prompt_templates.title: Setup focus
prompt_templates.prompt: What is the current setup grade for [SYMBOL]? Include entry zone, stop loss, and targets with R:R ratios.

prompt_templates.title: Liquidity focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Map all unswept liquidity for [SYMBOL]. Where are BSL and SSL levels? What recent sweeps occurred?

prompt_templates.title: Scenario planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Present bullish and bearish scenarios for [SYMBOL]. What triggers each scenario? What are the confluence factors and targets?

output: Bias: BULLISH - Structure shows higher highs with recent ChoCH confirmation
Key Levels: SSL at $84,450, BSL at $89,400
Setup Grade: B+ with entry at $87,946-$88,049 (unfilled FVG)
Stop: $87,500 below recent BOS level, 0.95% risk
Confluence: ChoCH confirmed, FVG present, price in premium (caution)

best_practices: Always present analysis as scenarios, not predictions
Include risk warnings with every setup
Grade setups honestly - do not oversell low-quality setups
anti_patterns: Making definitive price predictions or guaranteed outcomes
Ignoring contradictory signals in the analysis
Providing trading advice instead of educational analysis

faq.question: What markets does this skill analyze?
faq.answer: Any market with price data including crypto, forex, stocks, and futures. Supports symbols like BTC/USDT, ETH/USDT, and SOL/USDT.

faq.question: What timeframes are supported?
faq.answer: From 1-minute to weekly charts. Multi-timeframe analysis combines higher timeframe bias with lower timeframe entry timing.

faq.question: Does this skill execute trades?
faq.answer: No. This is an analysis tool only. It provides educational market breakdowns and does not connect to any exchange or broker.

faq.question: Is my trading data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only processes symbol and timeframe inputs you provide. No personal data or trade history is collected or stored.

faq.question: What if the analysis seems wrong?
faq.answer: Always validate AI analysis with your own research. This skill provides educational frameworks, not financial advice or guaranteed predictions.

faq.question: How is this different from trading indicators?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI interpretation of market patterns rather than mechanical signals. It explains the reasoning behind bias and setups.
